Review Name: Dont go for Voltas Review Description: No complaints on Flipkart. But after the product is at your hand, the accountability is now with Voltas to handle any repairs/replacements. Customer service from voltas is very very poor. So it may cost you near about 2-5k for the repais by your private repairmen. Also the swing does not turn to the extreme edges. So you need to sit/sleep at the center of the room to enjoy direct cooling.
